scripts.install-patches: echo --Apply patches-- && cd "!Patches" && pwd && sh ./patch-tool-apply-all && cd ..
scripts.install-bundle: echo --Install bundle submodule-- && ( test ! -d bundle || git rm -f bundle ) && git submodule add -f git@bitbucket.org:lilliputten/axiomica-questionnaire-v1-1810-bundle.git bundle
scripts.install-templates: echo --Install bem/templates submodule-- && ( test ! -d .bem/templates || git rm -f .bem/templates ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/bem-templates-classic.git .bem/templates
scripts.postinstall-parallel-SAMPLE: echo --Install additional packages (parallel)-- && npm-run-all --parallel install-templates install-bundle install-deploy
scripts.postinstall: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all install-patches install-templates install-bundle
scripts.test-make: set YENV=production&& node node_modules/enb/lib/cli/cli.js make pages/test
scripts.enb-clean: echo --Clean enb targets and cache-- && enb make clean && rm -Rf .enb/tmp
scripts.enb-make: echo --Running 'make' enb task (analog: gulp make)-- && set YENV=production&& enb make
scripts.clean: echo --Clean all generated targets-- && npm run -s enb-clean && rm -Rf bundle/* && echo (Bundle successfully cleaned)
scripts.lint-verbose: echo --JS source code linting (verbose mode)-- && set DEBUG=eslint:cli-engine&& eslint .
scripts.lint: echo --JS source code linting-- && eslint . --ext .js,.bemhtml,.bemjson && echo No problems found
scripts.bundle-serve-local: echo --Run static server for bundle (in bundle folder)-- && serve bundle
scripts.bundle-serve-root-SAMPLE: echo --Run static server for bundle (from project root)-- && serve ./
scripts.bundle-pack-UNUSED: echo --Pack bundle for demo server-- && rm -f bundle-pack.zip && zip -r bundle-pack.zip bundle
scripts.bundle-commit: echo --Commit bundle for demo server-- && cd bundle && git add . -Av && git commit -am "auto-commit" && git push
scripts.bundle-rebuild: echo --Completely cleanup and rebuild bundle-- && npm run -s clean && npm run -s rebuild
scripts.bundle-remake: echo --Gently remake bundle-- && npm run -s remake
scripts.bundle-rebuild-pack-UNUSED: echo --Rebuild and pack bundle-- && npm run -s bundle-rebuild && npm run -s bundle-pack
scripts.bundle-rebuild-commit: echo --Rebuild and commit bundle-- && npm run -s bundle-rebuild && npm run -s bundle-commit
scripts.bundle-remake-commit: echo --Remake and commit bundle-- && npm run -s bundle-remake && npm run -s bundle-commit
scripts.test: echo --Run all tests-- && npm run -s lint && echo (Real tests comes here)
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
